title: Medal Dao
description: Medal Dao is a decentralized anonymous organization, using NFT medal idendities to demostrate your personal value.

features.title: Build up the valuable business network
features.description: Medal Dao welcome everyone to join the community. We will employ "Behaviour Mining" Model, using the community based measurable tasks to facilitate different business senarios. Related community memebers will get rewarded based on our consensus

webinor.title: Webinor Workflow
webinor.description: We will work with our community members to periodically co-organize online webinors.

roadshow.title: Roadshow
roadshow.description: We will work with our community members to co-organize roadshows.

dealmacthing.title: Deal Macthing
dealmacthing.description: After successfully matching the deals, the related community memebers will get rewarded.
